message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I believe the product is worth more.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I am willing to pay $13,200 for the product.
